title: EduMentorMe
description: Your hub for all things education

body.raw:
## Features

<Grid>

<Card href="/search">

### Search üîç

Search through an abundance of **high-quality** educational resources.

</Card>

<Card href="/study_timer">

### Study Timer üïí

**Track** your study time with our aesthetically pleasing **study timer**.

</Card>

<Card href="/todos">

### Personal Todo List ‚úÖ

Always stay organised via this simple yet effective **Todo List** feature.

</Card>

<Card href="/" disabled>

### AI ü§ñ

Your personal **GPT-powered** chatbot that will answer all of your enquiries.

</Card>

</Grid>
